overview: Pavlos and Leon are two inseparable friends who dream of opening one bar once the war is over. The SS, searching the house, arrest his parents Pavlos not being able to find Leon. The two friends embark on a journey through the forests to reach Thessaloniki. Away from civilization, Paul struggles with his dark side which is slowly awakening.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

title: The dome
